```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
library(DBI)
library(yaml)
```

```{r}
# Read Data
future_raw <- readr::read_csv("data/future_sample.csv") %>%
  select(-X1)

future_raw %>%
  select(song_id,
         title, 
         title_with_featured,
         release_date,
         url, 
         published,
         tags,
         recording_location,
         artist,
         primary_artist_id,
         artist_url,
         featured_artist_ids,
         featuring__href,
         featuring__text,
         album_id,
         album__href,
         album__text,
         produced_by__href,
         produced_by__text,
         lyrics_language,
         lyrics_created_at,
         lyrics_updated_at,
         lyrics_state,
         lyrics) %>%
  names() %>% length()
```

```{r}
# Inspect & Clean
future_raw %>%
  nrow()

future_raw %>% 
  filter(primary_artist_id == 2197) %>%
  nrow()

future_raw %>% 
  count(primary_artist_id, sort = T)

future_raw %>% 
  count(lyrics_language, sort = T)

future_raw %>% 
  count(published, sort = T)

future <- future_raw %>%
  filter(lyrics_language == "en",
         primary_artist_id == 2197)
```

```{r}
# Unnest Tags
future_tags <- future %>%
  mutate(tags = str_remove_all(tags, "'"),
         tags = str_remove_all(tags, "(\\[|\\])"),
         tags = str_split(tags, ", ")) %>%
  unnest(tags)
  
future_tags %>%
  count(tags, sort = T)
```

```{r}
future %>%
  select(-tags) %>%
  distinct(song_id, .keep_all = T) %>%
  mutate(lyrics = str_replace(lyrics, '^\\[', ''),
         lyrics = str_replace(lyrics, '\\]$', ''),
         lyrics = str_replace_all(lyrics, '"', ''),
         lyrics = str_split(lyrics, ', ')) %>%
  unnest(lyrics) %>%
  View()
# Ready for tidytext!
```

```{r}
# Read from the DB!
creds = read_yaml("db/genius_db.yml")
con <- dbConnect(RMariaDB::MariaDB(), 
                 username = creds$username,
                 password = creds$password,
                 host = creds$host,
                 dbname = creds$database)
dbListTables(con)

res <- dbSendQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM songs_v1")
songs <- dbFetch(res)
dbClearResult(res)
```

```{r}
songs %>%
  # TODO: Are lyric lines being split properly?
```
